definitions.definition: A follower of Plato , a Platonist .
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the mid 16th century.

definitions.definition: A senior member of an academy , college, or university; a person who attends an academy; a person engaged in scholarly pursuits; one who is academic in practice.
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the late 16th century.

definitions.definition: A member of the Academy ; an academician .
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the mid 18th century.
First attested in the early 19th century.
First attested in the late 20th century.

main_definition: ( usually capitalized ) A follower of Plato , a Platonist . [First attested in the mid 16th century.]
secondary_definitions: A senior member of an academy , college, or university; a person who attends an academy; a person engaged in scholarly pursuits; one who is academic in practice. [First attested in the late 16th century.]
A member of the Academy ; an academician . [First attested in the mid 18th century.]
( archaic ) A student in a college .
( plural only ) Academic dress; academicals . [First attested in the early 19th century.]
( plural only ) Academic studies. [First attested in the late 20th century.]
